title: Operad理论及相关课题国际研讨会于2024.11.3-11.7举办
content: The 4th International Conference on Operad Theory and Related Topics November 3-7, 2024 Organizers Cheng-Ming Bai (Nankai University) Yan-Hong Bao (Anhui University) Yu Ye (University of Science and Technology of China) James J. Zhang (University of Washington) Guo-Dong Zhou (East China Normal University) Contact Information Kai Wang E-mail: wangkai17@ustc.edu.cn Guilai Liu E-mail: liugl@mail.nankai.edu.cn Conference Website https://icotrt2024.github.io Schedule of Lectures.pdf
